title: How can I create a new account at pbe?
body: i want to open new an account at pbe. can I get help.

replies.body: At the moment, [**pbe signups**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) are closed for maintenance. We're working on improving the signup process to make it a little smoother for you guys! We don't have an exact timeline, but we'll be sure to post updates as we know them!
